page.title: 14Police in Wolsingham
page.content: The{police station}is only a house in a small housing estate and is open between 9am and 5pm.The main station is in Crook,6 miles east with a substation at Stanhope 6 miles westwards.The original police station and house has been converted into two private houses. The{local policeman}is Mr Halliday. He has been in Wolsingham for two years living in a house next door to his station.He loves walking and talking to the public, but enjoys court appearances rather less. His work includes desk duty,foot and mobile patrols,traffic control and collecting stray dogs. There is{not much crime}in the town but he has been beaten up twice.Being a policeman means that he does not have many friends outside the Force.
